description:
My place is close to Central Park, Two Little Red Hens, the subway . You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, the kitchen, and the coziness. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups. Located in a hostoric walkup.

You will be able to use all of the space in the entire apartment! Let me know if you need anything or cannot find anything!

You will be able to access the entire apartment :)

I am here to help you have the best experience in NYC as possible. Please ask me for any recommendations if needed!

The neighborhood is filled with great shopping, food, museums and central park!

the subway is just 3 blocks away on 86 and lexington avenue. It is the 4,5,6 train!

Please be respectful to my house and guests around you. Please do not disturb them.
name: AWESOME! 2 BED 3 Blocks from CENTRAL PARK!!!
review: The apartment was clean, and the location was perfect!
